content.raw:
There is just not enough time allowed to figure out cloudsim.  I am at the point where I can get docker to build if I ssh to the field computer and tell it to build from the git URL, but it fails to build when I launch a constellation with the same URL and put in the private key.
The manual build takes about 15 minutes and with fiddling around, trying to see what is going on, an hour goes by pretty fast.
I'm now down to just one more try with my original allocation of time.

Monitoring the docker build in the FC, you can see both being built here.  The manual finishes after a while, but the build that started with the instance never finishes.  The manual one asks for my github credentials.  The one that starts with the instance has the private key to access the repo.


```
#!c++

ps aux | grep "docker build"
ubuntu     734  0.0  0.0  12944  1016 pts/2    S+   13:55   0:00 grep --color=auto docker build
ubuntu   29694  0.4  0.1 387516 21680 pts/0    Sl+  13:49   0:01 docker build -t testbuild myGitRepoURL
```
content.html:
There is just not enough time allowed to figure out cloudsim. I am at the point where I can get docker to build if I ssh to the field computer and tell it to build from the git URL, but it fails to build when I launch a constellation with the same URL and put in the private key. The manual build takes about 15 minutes and with fiddling around, trying to see what is going on, an hour goes by pretty fast. I'm now down to just one more try with my original allocation of time.

Monitoring the docker build in the FC, you can see both being built here. The manual finishes after a while, but the build that started with the instance never finishes. The manual one asks for my github credentials. The one that starts with the instance has the private key to access the repo.

ps aux | grep "docker build"
ubuntu     734  0.0  0.0  12944  1016 pts/2    S+   13:55   0:00 grep --color=auto docker build
ubuntu   29694  0.4  0.1 387516 21680 pts/0    Sl+  13:49   0:01 docker build -t testbuild myGitRepoURL
